code: import'./Splash.css';import React from'react';import Numeral from'numeral';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{makeGetCampaignsCount,makeGetUsersCount,makeGetCampaignContributionsCount,makeGetCampaignContributionsTotal}from'../modules';function Splash(_ref){var campaignsCount=_ref.campaignsCount,usersCount=_ref.usersCount,contributionsCount=_ref.contributionsCount,contributionsTotal=_ref.contributionsTotal;function formatCount(count){return Numeral(count).format('0,0');}function formatTotal(total){return Numeral(total).format('$0,0.00');}var divProps={className:"Splash"};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",divProps,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,"Please select a campaign above to begin."),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null,"We've helped raise ",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,formatTotal(contributionsTotal),"!")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,formatCount(usersCount))," people have donated"," ",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,formatCount(contributionsCount))," times to"," ",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,formatCount(campaignsCount))," campaigns."));}var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,props){var getCampaignsCount=makeGetCampaignsCount(state);var getUsersCount=makeGetUsersCount(state);var getCampaignContributionsCount=makeGetCampaignContributionsCount(state);var getCampaignContributionsTotal=makeGetCampaignContributionsTotal(state);return{campaignsCount:getCampaignsCount(),usersCount:getUsersCount(),contributionsTotal:getCampaignContributionsTotal(),contributionsCount:getCampaignContributionsCount()};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Splash);
